description: Try this plant-based burger recipe with delicious black bean and beetroot patties and crisp lettuce leaf 'buns' for a healthier burger option.
name: Bunless Black Bean & Beetroot Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain cucumber. Place half the lettuce leaves on a clean surface, then top with burgers, tomato, onion, cucumber, a drizzle of yoghurt mixture and extra coriander. Sandwich with remaining lettuce leaves and serve.
